thread.title: eBay India unveils ‘Loudest Diwali Ever’ scheme, offers up to 75% discount ; check ebay.in
thread.title_full: eBay India unveils ‘Loudest Diwali Ever’ scheme, offers up to 75% discount ; check ebay.in | The Financial Express

author: financialexpress.com
title: eBay India unveils ‘Loudest Diwali Ever’ scheme, offers up to 75% discount ; check ebay.in
text:
Other Articles ServiceSource Announces Plans to Open Service Delivery Center in Philippines Fast food rivals expand, hitting Yum Brands sales in India CA Technologies Celebrates 10th Anniversary of CA Together in Action Employee Volunteer Month eBay India is offering up to 75% discounts, promising exclusive launches and even, for the first time, trial offers for those debuting on ebay.in
eBay India is set to celebrate yet another cracking festival season with its consumers with the launch of the ‘Loudest Diwali Ever’ scheme offering discounted deals and flash sales across product categories available on ebay.in till 13th November.
Consumers logging into eBay.in will see up to 75% discounts in the technology segment including mobile phones, televisions, cameras, laptops, tablets, audio & home entertainment among others. Launches by Intex, LAVA and Philips for smartphones will give consumers a chance to be amongst the first to buy the latest offerings – customers can also pre-book the Apple iWatch and Apple iPhone 6S.
First time users will get rewarded for shopping on eBay.in with free movie tickets, free cab ride, dinner for two and more. The platform will also run flash sales for first time buyers on Sandisk pen drives which will be available for Rs 79 (original price of Rs 499).
Navin Mistry, Head Retail Exports and Lifestyle Category, eBay India said, “Over the last decade, eBay India has focused on delivering a fantastic user experience for Indian consumers to buy the widest variety of products at great prices. We aim to make this the Loudest Diwali Ever for our customers with exceptional and wide-ranging inventory on offer coupled with safe & seamless shopping experience.”
First Published on October 07, 2015 5:36 pm
